Embryo aneuploidy cite primary reason low embryo implantation achieve human IVF . In majority IVF program embryo selection mainly base microscopic assessment embryo . Culturing embryos blastocyst stage selection mechanism see increase implantation rate , presumably indicate morphologically normal blastocyst form day 5 culture may reduce aneuploidy rate . Morphological normality , however , completely preclude aneuploidy , many transfer cryopreserved embryo bearing factor may hold increase risk implantation failure miscarriage . To select condition single blastocyst transfer significantly improve reproductive outcome ; increase implantation , reduced pregnancy loss increase live birth rate .
DOC.brief_title: Idealizing Pregnancy Outcome With Single Blastocyst Transfer FET Cycle
DOC.detailed_description: Methodology Patients : Patients le 40 year age normal ovarian reserve ( > 10 antral follicle count ) , normal BMI ( > 18 < 30 ) 3 previous IVF cycle consult elective single embryo transfer ( eSET ) present condition trial . Patients accept condition trial randomly allocate two group study ; Group 1 ; blastocyst ( N-blastocyst ) aneuploidy screen vitrification cryostorage , Group 2 ; patient least 2 blastocyst biopsied aCGH aneuploidy screening ( S-blastocysts ) blastocyst , vitrify cryostored . Controlled ovarian stimulation ( COS ) : All patient stimulate multiple follicular development use fix antagonist protocol recombinant follicle stimulate hormone ( rFSH ) human menopausal gonadotropin ( HMG ) . Final oocyte maturation trigger use bolus dose gonadotropin release hormone ( GnRH ) agonist . Intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) : oocyte insemination do ICSI , 2-4 hour oocyte collection . All result 2 pronucleus ( PN ) zygotes cultured day 5 . Blastocyst score selection ; Blastocyst score 3 criterion ; scale 1 ( morula/early blastocyst ) 6 ( hatch blastocyst ) expansion scale A C ( A good , B fair , C poor ) inner cell mass ( ICM ) trophectoderm ( TE ) morphology . Patients include study must least 2 blastocyst expansion grade 3 day 5 culture . Exclusion criterion : All patient le 5 oocyte collect time oocyte pickup ( OPU ) exclude study . All patient < 2 blastocyst expansion grade 3 day 5 culture exclude study . Vitrification : All suitable blastocyst vitrify use Kitazato cryotop method , single blastocyst per device . aCGH : An external laboratory use screening select blastocyst . All biopsy perform day 5 culture remove 3-5 cell TE . Harvested TE cell wash place tube , direct genetic laboratory , transport genetics laboratory . Frozen embryo transfer ( FET ) : A natural cycle program use E2 P4 supplementation determine time ( progesterone day 6 ) blastocyst warm transfer . Outcomes measure : pregnancy rate ( positive βhCG per blastocyst transfer ) , implantation rate ( fetal sac per blastocyst transfer ) , ongoing pregnancy rate ( fetal heart per blastocyst transfer ) , single normal live delivery ( baby per blastocyst transfer baby per positive βhCG ) . Setting : Antalya IVF It advise attempt perform embryo aneuploid screen IVF laboratory proven extend embryo ( day 6 ) culture embryo vitrification proficiency . At Antalya IVF 70 % cycle extended culture cycle acceptable implantation rate 42 % fresh 44 % vitrified-warmed blastocyst . These reproductive outcome maintain last calender year .
DOC.criteria: Patients le 40 year age normal ovarian reserve ( > 10 antral follicle count ) , normal BMI ( > 18 < 30 ) 3 previous IVF cycle All patient le 5 oocyte collect time OPU exclude study . All patient < 2 blastocyst expansion grade 3 day 5 culture exclude study .
